text: Saro Shah or Sari is a town and Union Council of Mardan District in the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province of Pakistan. It is located at 34°14'9N 71°54'30E and has a height of 316 metres (1040 feet).Location of Sari - Falling Rain Genomics ==References== Category:Union councils of Mardan District
title: Saro Shah
